Eternal Pyre

Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Eternal Pyre
A huge blazing pyre lights up the landscape. It never burns out and the embers of the pyre will absorb the heat and can be harvested as magical gems imbued with the fiery power of the pyre.
Generates 20 Fire gems each month.
